version.prefix: create table #tmp_sp_enum_login_for_proxy(proxy_id int null, proxy_name nvarchar(128), flags int null, name nvarchar(128) null, sid varbinary(85) null, principal_id int null ) insert into #tmp_sp_enum_login_for_proxy(proxy_id, proxy_name, flags, name, sid, principal_id) exec msdb.dbo.sp_enum_login_for_proxy delete from #tmp_sp_enum_login_for_proxy where name is NULL
